name: sharable-password-protected-posts
description: Share password protected posts via secret URLs
author: gaambo

scripts.format: npm run format:js && npm run format:php
scripts.format:php: npm run env:cli composer run-script phpcbf
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:php
scripts.lint:php: npm run env:cli composer run-script lint && npm run env:cli composer run-script phpcs
scripts.plugin-check: wp-env run cli wp plugin check wp-content/plugins/sharable-password-protected-posts --require=wp-content/plugins/plugin-check/cli.php
scripts.i18n: npm run i18n:pot && npm run i18n:php
scripts.i18n:pot: npm run env:cli wp i18n make-pot ./ ./languages/sharable-password-protected-posts.pot --exclude="build" --domain=sharable-password-protected-posts
scripts.i18n:php: npm run env:cli wp i18n make-php ./languages
